About me

Hi! Im Celine and Im 21 years old. After spending the first 17 years of my life in a very small village in Italy I decided to come to Amsterdam to study at Vrije Universiteit. I graduated in Communication and Information Studies: Language and Media in 2022.

Knight Academy Internship

I started my web development internship in January 2023. We started the internship by getting an overview of what we will be doing in the couple months. I learned that HTML is for structure, CSS is for style and Javascript deals with behaviour. Nonetheless, I soon found out that this internship would have thought me more than coding.

Projects

I am currently journaling every week so that I can keep track of my progress and projects! Click on the links if you want to know more about it.
